name: üì∏ Visual Regression Failures

name: üïµÔ∏è Locator/Selector Issues

name: ‚ùå Functional Assertion Failures

name: üîÑ Stale Element

name: üåê Network/API Errors

name: üí• Script/Runtime Errors

name: ‚öôÔ∏è CI/Infrastructure Issues
